original: intros x y m. unfold satisfies, denote_andp. intros n Hle. split. - intros [Hx Hy]. split. + apply (sat_andp m x y). split; apply (sat_mono m n x); auto. + apply (sat_andp m x y). split; apply (sat_mono m n y); auto. - intros [Hxy _]. apply sat_andp in Hxy. destruct Hxy as [Hx Hy]. split; [apply (sat_impp m x y) | apply (sat_impp m y x)]; intros n Hle'; apply Hx || apply Hy; apply (Korder_no_branch n m) || auto.
